subject: unit testing java bean deployed on app server
msgSnippet: Hi Friends, Can we unit test a java bean (not ejb) deployed on application server? Thanks in advance. Best Regards, Tejal ... From: junit@yahoogroups.com
messageBody:
Hi Friends,

Can we unit test a java bean (not ejb) deployed on application server?

Thanks in advance.
Best Regards,
Tejal
